name: Neon Altar
description: by Mariya Vasilyeva - All five NFT’s are video assemblages that explore the impact of today’s digitalized economy on postmodernity, focusing on themes such as pornography, power relations, and the struggle of self-articulation and regulation. The videos play with iconographic portrayals of sacred beings, humorously reinvent Solomon’s Columns by enriching them with elements of pornography and cheerleading or approach the aesthetics of intestines by creating a self-sewn garment.
